1.content: So, we have entered the reality of the Lion King saga. Not to be confused with The Lion Guard. There is no roar of the elders, and there is no magical tree of life or Evil Lions visiting via fire. But before we start, there's a surprising twist. In some part of the saga, things have played out differently in some way. But before we dive in to what is altered, we need to figure out, which era is altered?
1.title: Our Story Begins

choices: Sarafina is Mother to Simba and Nala. And Maybe Mheetu.
Sarafina mothered Simba, Sarabi Mothered Nala.
Let's include Mheetu, Nala's little brother into the Lion King.
Let's try some other alterations to the first film.
11.content: Okay, so we are in the era of the Lion King. It can be anywhere from maybe a little while before the start of the actual film, like Simba not born yet, or it can be far into it where we're at the point that Simba is in the jungle as a cub or adult. So, let's get creative, what is altered about The Lion King era?
11.title: Starting from where the beginning.

choices: Yes, let's add in Mheetu as their little brother.
No, let's just have Simba and Nala be siblings. OC's can be added later.
Yes, Mheetu can be in the story, but he's not their brother. He's a friend.
111.content:
Okay, so Sarafina has become the Mother of both Simba and Nala in this AU, making them brother and sister. And no, don't give me the argument of their siblings with two different mothers. That was never proven fact by Disney, and even The Lion King's spin off series in 2016, The Lion Guard, proved against that. Moving on.

Sarafina's mother to Simba and Nala, but before we press further into the story, one more question. Should we add in Mheetu into the mix?

(Please note that for those who may not be aware of who Mheetu is, Mheetu was a character put forth in the early stages of Lion King's development, and was removed from the story before production of the film was completed. In some adaptations, he was known as Nala's little brother, and in some of early drafts was characterized as a tag along, while in others, was too young to venture off from Pride Rock. In one story draft of another adaptation, if my memory serves me correctly, he was also listed as Simba's little brother, and he was the one who had been in the Stampede, with Simba and Mufasa both trying to save him, but both killed in the Stampede, and him running away similar to the scenario of what we see in the film with Simba. It's been a while, but this was based off of research I did a while back for how the Lion King Film came about.)
111.title: Sarafina  mothered to Simba, Nala, and/or Mheetu.

choices: Simba, instead of running away, runs back to Pride Rock.
Simba is found by another lion pride, instead of Timon and Pumba.
A human kid has entered the Pridelands. (Possible Transformation might happen.)
Simba runs way to a snowy region, not the desert or oasis.
Let's try some other scenarios of the first film.
115.content: Okay, so what other scenarios would you like to try to make as alteration for the Lion King?
115.title: Let's try some other alterations.

1153.content: Will the kid be male or female?
1153.title: A human kid has entered the Pridelands. (Possib...

11531.content:
Maybe it could be a boy whose parents were killed and
the pride took him in after they saw him transform into
a lion cub?
11531.title: Male

choices: Zazu saw what happened to the king
1155.content: What other scene of the lion king do you want to alter?
1155.title: Let's try some other scenarios of the first...

choices: Scar kidnaps Simba as a cub
11553.title: Something else

choices: Same age as he was at the movie's start
115531.content: How old is Simba when he is kidnapped?
115531.title: Scar kidnaps Simba as a cub

choices: Kiara is Kopa's little Sister. (Kopa is a character that was in certain books.)
Zira is the Pridelander whereas Simba is the Outlander
12.content: Okay, so we are in the era of the Lion King 2. It can be anywhere from maybe a little while before the start of the actual film, like Kiara not born yet, or it can be far into it where we're at the point that Kiara has run away with Kovu. So, let's get creative, what is altered about The Lion King 2 era?
12.title: The Lion King 2 era.

123.content: Could a human OC transform into a lion cub?
123.title: Someone transforms

choices: Kovu is Simba's son and Kiara is Zora's daughter
Kiara is kidnapped as a lion cub
125.title: Other choices

1251.content: So that means that Kovu is the civilized Pride Lion and Kiara is the violent, almost feral Outlander right?
1251.title: Kovu is Simba's son and Kiara is Zira's...

info.brief_description: What if Things Went Different in the Lion King Saga?
info.description:
This interactive will be rated for Readers 13 Years and Older Only for mentions of subjects that are ideologically sensitive.

In this interactive, Events go differently in the Lion King, or the Lion King 2, depending on where you want to start in the saga. And before you ask, The Lion Guard will not be tied into this, so no roar of the elders and forming the Lion Guard. You can have Kion included, but not for Lion Guard purposes. This can range to anything, from Sarafina mothering Simba instead of Sarabi, to Nala and Simba adopting Kovu when they first encounter him.

I also do want to keep this story going, so keep the options open in this interactive for others to branch their idea from yours. If I see only a one way continuation I will add another chapter selection the first time, but if I see it repeated by the same user, I will delete the chapter, and then I will block that user from the story. Also if you make an end chapter that trolls the creativity of everyone elses add-ons to the story, like saying, "And then an asteroid hit the Pridelands, and everyone died. The End.", I will delete the chapter, and I will block said user.

Now, moving onto,
Things that "Are" allowed:
1. Breastfeeding/Nursing (Whichever you prefer to call it.) This can not be described in a sexual manner.
2. Pregnancy. Yes, lionesses can be pregnant in this story, but do not describe birth or anything that is sensitive on that subject. And do not have the pregnant lionesses in a sexual scene.
3. Humans turned Lions or Lion Cubs. I ask not to throw a bundle of OC's into the chapter, but one or two are fine..
4. Mentions of eating prey, but don't go into heavy detail. And don't mention them swallowing live prey, that's vore territory.
5. Straight couples. I'll allow more than one male lion to be in the story. But don't go overboard.

Things That Are "Not" Allowed:

1. Vore of any sort. No loopholes.
2. Sex scenes. Need to keep this PG13.
3. Death of protagonists. (Killing off villains, including an evil version of the protagonist is acceptable, just don't go into detail.)
4. No switching to a particular P.O.V. of one of the characters. This will stay in Third Person P.O.V.
5. Gay Male Couples. (I'll allow Lesbian couples, since a pride is made up of mostly lionesses.
6. No Gender Swaps of the characters through any means. They stay their original genders, that's the one thing that won't be changed for this Alternate Universe interactive.
7. No Gore or Violence. Again, I will allow the mention of the pride eating meat for one of their meals, but no heavy details or mentions of what animal they are eating.
8. No cursing.
9. No death through illness.
10. No Incest. (And don't give me the whole "Simba and Nala are siblings" arguement. Lion Guard already disproved that.)
11. No crossovers of other movies/TV series. (Timon and Pumba is with in the Lion King universe, but the Lion Guard is it's own universe that branched off.)
12. No accelerated Age Progression. All animals will age at a natural human aging pace, meaning they will age as fast as humans.

Be aware, these rules may be subject to change. If any of rules I listed above for what cannot happen in the interactive are broken, I will delete the chapter. Repeat attempts at a deleted chapter will result in a block from my content. If you are unsure about a chapter you want to post, email me on site, and I'll let you know if I'm okay with you posting it. Do not email with a request to be able to have exemption from the rules. Rules are rules, and I will not make exceptions to them.

I hope you enjoy the interactive, have fun.
